attributes.action: withdraw the peerage from the convicted Lord Black
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The conviction and incarceration of Lord Black has proven that he is untrustworthy, fraudulent and, as Tom Bower wrote, "he has never felt that he needed to obey the rules". This is not a person to be in a position of power and responsibility within the British democracy.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
